SEARCH
Package com.example.rupizzeria

Class ShareResource

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.ShareResource
public class ShareResource extends Object
Singleton class to manage shared resources across activities. This includes cart items, order lists, and associated data.
Author:
Vy Nguyen

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ShareResource getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of ShareResource. Synchronized to ensure thread safety.
      Returns:
      The ShareResource instance.

    • getCartItems

      public List<Pizza> getCartItems()
      Returns the list of items in the cart.
      Returns:
      A List of Pizza objects.

    • addPizzaToCart

      public void addPizzaToCart(Pizza pizza, String style)
      Adds a Pizza to the cart and maps its style.
      Parameters:
      pizza - The Pizza object to add.
      style - The style of the pizza (e.g., Chicago, NY).

    • removePizzaFromCart

      public void removePizzaFromCart(Pizza pizza)
      Removes a Pizza from the cart and updates its style mapping.
      Parameters:
      pizza - The Pizza object to remove.

    • getOrdersList

      public List<Order> getOrdersList()
      Returns the list of placed orders.
      Returns:
      A List of Order objects.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder(Order order)
      Adds an order to the order list.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object to add.

    • cancelOrder

      public void cancelOrder(Order order)
      Cancels and removes an order from the order list.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object to remove.

    • getCurrentOrder

      public Order getCurrentOrder()
      Returns the current order being built.
      Returns:
      The current Order object.

    • startNewOrder

      public void startNewOrder()
      Starts a new order by clearing the cart and incrementing the order number.

    • getPizzaStyle

      public String getPizzaStyle(Pizza pizza)
      Returns the style of a specific pizza.
      Parameters:
      pizza - The Pizza object.
      Returns:
      The style of the pizza (e.g., Chicago, NY), or "Unknown Style" if not found.

    • showAlertDialog

      public void showAlertDialog(android.content.Context context, String title, String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with the given title and message.
      Parameters:
      context - The context of the activity or application
      title - The title of the dialog
      message - The message of the dialog

    • formatToppingName

      public String formatToppingName(Topping topping)
      Formats a topping name for display.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The formatted topping name

    • getPizzaImageResource

      public int getPizzaImageResource(Pizza pizza)
      Determines the image resource for a given pizza based on its style and type.
      Parameters:
      pizza - The pizza whose image resource is to be determined.
      Returns:
      The resource ID of the corresponding image.
